Title: Relates to a partial tax abatement for residential real property held in the cooperative or condominium form of ownership in the city of New York
Summary: Relates to the application for a partial tax abatement for residential real property held in the cooperative or condominium form of ownership in the city of New York.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to a partial tax abatement for residential real property held in the cooperative or condominium form of ownership in the city of New York
